trans-unit.source: Lets users select a printer and choose which sections of the document to print from a Windows Forms application.
When you create an instance of PrintDialog, the read/write properties are set to initial values.
For a list of these values, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
To get printer settings that are modified by the user with the PrintDialog, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.PrinterSettings%2A> property.
For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
If you want to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog"></xref> class.
When you create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>, the following read/write properties are set to initial values.

|Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowPrintToFile%2A>|`true`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSelection%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.Document%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.PrinterSettings%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.PrintToFile%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.ShowHelp%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.ShowNetwork%2A>|`true`| You can change the value for any one of these properties through a separate call to the property.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **Current Page** option button is displayed.
This property is valid for Windows 2000 and later versions of Windows operating systems.
On operating systems earlier than Windows 2000, the AllowCurrentPage property has no effect.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the **Current Page** option button is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **Print to file** check box is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the **Print to file** check box is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **Selection** option button is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the **Selection** option button is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **Pages** option button is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the **Pages** option button is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> used to obtain <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> used to obtain <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the printer settings the dialog box modifies.
The PrinterSettings property must be set before you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A> or an exception will occur.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref> the dialog box modifies.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **Print to file** check box is selected.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the **Print to file** check box is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Resets all options, the last selected printer, and the page settings to their default values.
To be added.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **Help** button is displayed.
This property was marked obsolete in Windows 2000 and does not affect this and later versions of Windows.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the **Help** button is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **Network** button is displayed.
This property was marked obsolete in Windows 2000 and does not affect this and later versions of Windows.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the **Network** button is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog should be shown in the Windows XP style for systems running [!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/add/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)] or later.

When this property is set to `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.ShowHelp%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.ShowNetwork%2A> will be ignored as these properties were made obsolete for Windows 2000 and later versions of Windows.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the dialog should be shown with the Windows XP style, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
